items.title: Score Beats Powerbeats Fit down at $140 (Reg. $200, open-box)
items.summary:
The Beats Powerbeats Fit are $139.99 (reg. $199.99) right now, and they’re a strong pick if you want earbuds that stay locked in, sound great, and handle calls and workouts without drama. These are open-box, which essentially means they’re excess retail inventory that, while they may show a bit of handling, are still verified as new and repackaged cleanly. You probably know that there are a lot of earbuds out there that sound great—until you start moving, take a call outside, or hit that point in the day where everything needs to happen at once. That’s why these are most definitely worth a look.
